column2: Challenging Period. Neptune conjunction Mercury: Altered default mode network activity. Highly intuitive but prone to magical thinking.  Saturn square Sun: Reduced dopamine in reward pathways. Difficulty celebrating achievements, chronic dissatisfaction. Saturn conjunction Moon: Elevated cortisol (stress hormone), reduced serotonin availability. Difficulty expressing emotions, feelings of being emotionally burdened.
column3: Neptune conjunction Mercury: Altered default mode network activity. Highly intuitive but prone to magical thinking.
column4: Uranus conjunction Sun: Radical self-reinvention, rejection of past identity.
column5: Saturn square Mars: Suppressed fight response, anger turned inward. Feeling stuck, can't take action, passive-aggressive.
column6: Uranus square Moon: Unpredictable emotions, restlessness, need for freedom.
column7: No significant transits affecting mental state currently.
column8: Stable. Saturn square Moon: Stress response activation, amygdala hyperactivity. Self-criticism about feelings, emotional shutdown under pressure.
column9: Jupiter trine Moon: Feeling hopeful, emotionally generous, seeing possibilities.

column11: Neptune square Moon: Absorbing others' emotions, unclear what you actually feel.
